channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Megalodon: The broad diet of the megatooth shark

item.title: 'Hopelessly attached': Scientists discover new 2D material that sticks the landing
item.description: Researchers have discovered a new 2D material, confirming decade-old prediction.

item.title: Daytime boosts immunity, scientists find
item.description: Daylight can boost the immune system's ability to fight infections.
